ai-tha-ap230:0.3_0: he gave the gift of the Elder Rains Retreat to the Elder Nun Ball
ai-tha-ap230:1.3_0: grew the hair from its beard,
ai-tha-ap230:2.2_0: I worship those worthy of offerings.
ai-tha-ap230:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap230:2.4_0: this (true) fruit is recommended by the Awakening One,
ai-tha-ap230:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vijayā.
ai-tha-ap230:6.1_0: having eighth victory over the Elder Migāra’s mother,
